title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Collaboration-Based Legal Education Innovation Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students enhance their ability to perform team projects using online collaboration tools for legal case analysis

Learners structure legal arguments in digital environments (enterprise collaboration tools, emails, online documents) into three phases (problem definition → legal basis presentation → conclusion derivation) and write communication reports rated "excellent" in four or more of five peer evaluation rubric items.

Participants explain three blended learning design principles combining traditional classroom instruction (synchronous activities) and online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.) over four weeks and provide one or more lesson scenario examples applying each principle.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
